guid.comments: string. guid, unique only within the mod. Will be turned into GUID 'mod:'+$yourModId+':'+$guid
numInstancesInDeck.comments: (Optional) int >=0 [default=1]. How many times this tile can appear in the draw deck. Set 0 to disable drawing this tile.

hexes.rampagingEnemyType.comments: (Optional) EnemyType::GUID [default=NONE]. Enemy will be drawn from the list of enemies of this type. Either specify 'rampagingEnemyType' or 'rampagingEnemy' but not both.

hexes.comments: List<MapHexData>[7]. List of hexes configuration for this tile (7 hexes exactly). See 'hexes.jpg' for hexes location.
